title: 3-Photon GHZ State Generator via Sequential Entanglement Swapping
description: Generates genuine 3-photon GHZ states by performing sequential Bell state measurements on shared photons from three independent SPDC sources to create tripartite entanglement through quantum swapping

parameters.description: Electronic control unit that processes Bell state measurement outcomes from 4 Bell detectors and gates the final 3-photon GHZ measurements. Performs real-time feedforward to identify successful swapping events and herald genuine GHZ state generation.

physics_explanation: Three independent SPDC sources create Bell pairs (A1,A2), (B1,B2), and (C1,C2). Sequential Bell state measurements on the shared photons (A2,B1) at Bell PBS 1 and (B2,C1) at Bell PBS 2 perform entanglement swapping, projecting the remaining photons A1, B2, C2 into a genuine 3-photon GHZ state |GHZ⟩ = (|HHH⟩ + |VVV⟩)/√2. The Bell measurement outcomes determine which local unitary operations are needed to obtain the desired GHZ state.

component_justifications.Pump Laser 1: 405nm pump for first SPDC source generating Bell pair (A1,A2)
component_justifications.Pump Laser 2: 405nm pump for second SPDC source generating Bell pair (B1,B2)
component_justifications.Pump Laser 3: 405nm pump for third SPDC source generating Bell pair (C1,C2)
component_justifications.BBO Crystal 1: Type-II SPDC crystal creating entangled photon pair A1-A2
component_justifications.BBO Crystal 2: Type-II SPDC crystal creating entangled photon pair B1-B2
component_justifications.BBO Crystal 3: Type-II SPDC crystal creating entangled photon pair C1-C2
component_justifications.Collection Lens 1: Collects and focuses SPDC photons from first crystal
component_justifications.Collection Lens 2: Collects and focuses SPDC photons from second crystal
component_justifications.Collection Lens 3: Collects and focuses SPDC photons from third crystal
component_justifications.Bandpass Filter 1: Filters 810nm down-converted photons, blocks pump light
component_justifications.Bandpass Filter 2: Filters 810nm down-converted photons, blocks pump light
component_justifications.Bandpass Filter 3: Filters 810nm down-converted photons, blocks pump light
component_justifications.BS1: Separates photon pair A1-A2 from first SPDC source
component_justifications.BS2: Separates photon pair B1-B2 from second SPDC source
component_justifications.BS3: Separates photon pair C1-C2 from third SPDC source
component_justifications.Mirror A1: Routes photon A1 to final GHZ detection path
component_justifications.Mirror A2: Routes photon A2 to first Bell measurement station
component_justifications.Mirror B1: Routes photon B1 to first Bell measurement station
component_justifications.Mirror B2: Routes photon B2 to second Bell measurement station
component_justifications.Mirror C1: Routes photon C1 to second Bell measurement station
component_justifications.Mirror C2: Routes photon C2 to final GHZ detection path
component_justifications.Bell PBS 1: Performs Bell state measurement on photons A2 and B1 for first swapping operation
component_justifications.Bell PBS 2: Performs Bell state measurement on photons B2 and C1 for second swapping operation
component_justifications.HWP 1: Rotates polarization for optimal Bell state measurement at first PBS
component_justifications.HWP 2: Rotates polarization for optimal Bell state measurement at second PBS
component_justifications.Bell Detector 1A: Detects one output of first Bell state measurement
component_justifications.Bell Detector 1B: Detects other output of first Bell state measurement
component_justifications.Bell Detector 2A: Detects one output of second Bell state measurement
component_justifications.Bell Detector 2B: Detects other output of second Bell state measurement
component_justifications.Mirror GHZ A: Routes final GHZ photon A1 to analysis station
component_justifications.Mirror GHZ B: Routes final GHZ photon B2 to analysis station
component_justifications.Mirror GHZ C: Routes final GHZ photon C2 to analysis station
component_justifications.Polarizer A: Analyzes polarization of final GHZ photon A1
component_justifications.Polarizer B: Analyzes polarization of final GHZ photon B2
component_justifications.Polarizer C: Analyzes polarization of final GHZ photon C2
component_justifications.GHZ Detector A: Measures final GHZ state photon A1
component_justifications.GHZ Detector B: Measures final GHZ state photon B2
component_justifications.GHZ Detector C: Measures final GHZ state photon C2
component_justifications.Swapping Controller: Processes Bell measurement outcomes and gates GHZ detection events to herald successful 3-photon entanglement generation

expected_outcome: Successful Bell state measurements on shared photons herald generation of 3-photon GHZ states. Triple coincidence measurements on the remaining photons show correlations violating Mermin's inequality, confirming genuine tripartite entanglement with visibility >70%.
